attributes.action: give more rights to men forced or tricked into fatherhood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many men are being forced into fatherhood even though they say they do not want a baby with the mother. The mother then files for maintenance and the CSA are totally unforgiving when making the assesment. Is it really fair for men to be treated in this way you never here of a woman being forced into these positions they just seem to collect the money. This is sexist and a human rights issue and men should be protected the same as a woman.
